ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Transformation de REperes en Physique Spatiale Website
ResourceHeader.Description: TREPS is an online tool enabling common space physics coordinate transformations. It also allows time format transformations. Input data can be loaded from files, URL, or transferred via the IVOA SAMP protocol; accepted formats are CDF, netCDF, ascii and VOTable. Export to any of these formats are possible as well as direct vizualisation (plot) of input and output data.

InformationURL.Name: TREPS home page
InformationURL.Description: TREPS service home page at CDPP.
